Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Babylonia â€” Asimov's Lab"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I gave you a notification so long ago and you only come by just now. I'm starting to wonder if you're whole team's lazy like you.", 4: '1'}
{2: "So what's the matter?", 3: '7', 4: "I'm here right on time.", 5: '8'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Dodging the question, are we?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Anyway, punctuality isn't the issue. It's your team's enthusiasm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Forget it. There are more important matters.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Since you led your team while conducting the space station operation...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After evaluating the threat of such an operation, the Science Council has decided to implement a new safety measure to avoid a similar situation from happening again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'My research team has developed a combat simulator for emulating ideal combat scenarios based on the environmental data and team data collected thus far.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I\'ve named it "Project Babel Tower".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I believe you've already participated in the first phase of the experiment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "As far as the combat data report is concerned, I'm grateful for the contributions from each team involved.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "But as I've already made myself clear, this plan will be a long-term measure.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Based on the previous combat report, I've made some minor enhancements and adjustments to the device.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Also, I've integrated some environmental elements from the recent desert region.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'As always, give it everything you got so Command has more useful combat data to analyze and reference.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Got it.', 3: '21', 4: 'Are we getting paid?', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Providing combat data for more difficult scenarios will be beneficial for each squad going forward.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Looks like someone needs to learn a thing or two about manners. That being said, Command will provide you with supplies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'That about wraps it up. Enough wasting time. Now go make yourself useful.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Remember... More effective battle reports from higher levels will be of greater value.', 4: '1'}
